channel.title: The Effective Altruism Handbook You Can Remember
channel.description: Recent content on The Effective Altruism Handbook You Can Remember

item.title: Differences in Impact
item.description: Around 700 million people still live in poverty, mostly in low-income countries. Efforts to help them - by policy reform, cash transfers, or provision of health services - can be incredibly effective. Alongside investigating this issue, we also discuss how much more effective some interventions are than others, and we introduce a simple tool for estimating important figures. Key concepts from this session include: Differences in impact: It appears that some of our options to help do many times more good than others.
